metadata.title: Toa Kiryu | Official Website
metadata.description: I leverage cutting-edge technologies and frameworks to build modern, scalable web applications. Skilled in React and TypeScript, I specialize in frontend development.

avatarContent.name: Toa Kiryu
avatarContent.description: I create beautiful and functional products using the latest technologies and frameworks. I'm a passionate developer dedicated to building outstanding solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a student based in Japan who began programming as a hobby during elementary school. Initially, I created static websites with HTML and CSS. Now, I develop modern websites and applications using React, with TypeScript as my preferred language and Next.js as my favorite framework.

items.react: A library for building user interfaces for web and native applications
items.typescript: A programming language that extends JavaScript
items.nextjs: A React framework tailored for web development

titleContent.description: This page provides an overview of my projects. Not all projects I have worked on or contributed to may be listed here.

listItems.1: The personal information you provide will be used solely for responding to inquiries and providing relevant information.

listItems.3: Responses may take some time depending on the nature of your inquiry.
